about_the_game:
Get ready for Christmas and New Year with special costume-like gear: Bear Mask! Hurry while the celebration lasts!

Their characteristics will definitely make your enemies tremble!

Protection parameters: 250 protection from most types of damage, including mutants, anomalies, bullets, fire, poison and electricity.

Complete with air filter.

Non-transferrable. Can't be restored, but cheap to repair.

All the premium items (from DLC) will be placed in "Rewards" tab in your game account (on website). From there you can send them to any of your characters in the game.
detailed_description:
Get ready for Christmas and New Year with special costume-like gear: Bear Mask! Hurry while the celebration lasts!

Their characteristics will definitely make your enemies tremble!

Protection parameters: 250 protection from most types of damage, including mutants, anomalies, bullets, fire, poison and electricity.

Complete with air filter.

Non-transferrable. Can't be restored, but cheap to repair.

All the premium items (from DLC) will be placed in "Rewards" tab in your game account (on website). From there you can send them to any of your characters in the game.
name: Anomaly Zone - Bear Mask

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6800 / ATI X1800 (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet speed 512 Kbps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX660 / Radeon HD 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet speed 1024 Kbps (for voice chat)

short_description: Get ready for Christmas and New Year with the special Bear Mask. Its characteristics will definitely make your enemies tremble. Hurry while the celebration lasts!
